text: A thin thread binds blade to wielder, knife dancing through the air, before the string snaps.
The blade rides a thread, shredding the strands.
Gathering blazing qi into a seal, it blooms in a radiant explosion that incinerates everything within its heart.
By compressing qi to its limit, you form a glowing lotus that detonates in a violent bloom, leaving only ash when it opens.
What blooms is not life, but destruction. A lotus born of qi, ending in a thunderous burst.
A silent lotus of beautiful light appears, floating for a breath only to bursts apart in a roaring eruption.
